verses.verse: It happened in the twelfth <WH8147> year, <WH8141> in the twelfth month, <WH2320> in the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> that the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take up <WH5375> a lamentation <WH7015> over Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and tell <WH559> him, <WH1819> You were likened to a young lion <WH3715> of the nations: <WH1471> yet you are as a monster <WH8577> in the seas; <WH3220> and you broke out <WH1518> with your rivers, <WH5104> and troubled <WH1804> the waters <WH4325> with your feet, <WH7272> and fouled <WH7515> their rivers. <WH5104>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> I will spread out <WH6566> my net <WH7568> on you with a company <WH6951> of many <WH7227> peoples; <WH5971> and they shall bring you up <WH5927> in my net. <WH2764>

I will leave <WH5203> you on the land, <WH776> I will cast you forth <WH2904> on the open <WH6440> field, <WH7704> and will cause all the birds <WH5775> of the sky <WH8064> to settle <WH7931> on you, <WH7646> and I will satisfy the animals <WH2416> of the whole earth with you. <WH776>
I will lay <WH5414> your flesh <WH1320> on the mountains, <WH2022> and fill <WH4390> the valleys <WH1516> with your height. <WH7419>
I will also water <WH8248> with your blood <WH1818> the land <WH776> in which you swim, <WH6824> even to the mountains; <WH2022> and the watercourses <WH650> shall be full of you. <WH4390>

When I shall extinguish <WH3518> you, <WH3680> I will cover the heavens, <WH8064> and make <WH6937> its stars <WH3556> dark; <WH6937> I will cover <WH3680> the sun <WH8121> with a cloud, <WH6051> and the moon <WH3394> shall not give <WH215> its light. <WH216>
All the bright <WH3974> lights <WH216> of the sky <WH8064> will I make dark <WH6937> over you, <WH5414> and set darkness <WH2822> on your land, <WH776> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

I will also trouble <WH3707> the hearts <WH3820> of many <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971> when I shall bring <WH935> your destruction <WH7667> among the nations, <WH1471> into the countries <WH776> which you have not known. <WH3045>

Yes, <WH7227> I will make many peoples <WH5971> amazed <WH8074> at you, <WH4428> and their kings shall be horribly <WH8178> afraid <WH8175> for you, <WH5774> when I shall brandish my sword <WH2719> before them; <WH6440> and they shall tremble <WH2729> at every moment, <WH7281> every man <WH376> for his own life, <WH5315> in the day <WH3117> of your fall. <WH4658>
For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> The sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> shall come on you. <WH935>

By the swords <WH2719> of the mighty <WH1368> will I cause your multitude <WH1995> to fall; <WH5307> the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471> are they all: <WH7703> and they shall bring to nothing the pride <WH1347> of Egypt, <WH4714> and all its multitude <WH1995> shall be destroyed. <WH8045>

I will destroy <WH6> also all its animals <WH929> from <WH5921> beside many <WH7227> waters; <WH4325> neither shall the foot <WH7272> of man <WH120> trouble <WH1804> them any more, <WH6541> nor the hoofs of animals <WH929> trouble them. <WH1804>
Then will I make their waters <WH4325> clear, <WH8257> and cause their rivers <WH5104> to run <WH3212> like oil, <WH8081> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

When I shall make <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> desolate <WH8077> and waste, <WH776> a land destitute <WH8074> of that of which it was full, <WH4393> when I shall strike <WH5221> all those who dwell <WH3427> therein, <WH3045> then shall they know that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

This is the lamentation <WH7015> with which they shall lament; <WH6969> the daughters <WH1323> of the nations <WH1471> shall lament <WH6969> therewith; <WH4714> over Egypt, and over all her multitude, <WH1995> shall they lament <WH6969> therewith, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
It happened also in the twelfth <WH8147> year, <WH8141> in the fifteenth <WH2568> day of the month, <WH2320> that the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> wail <WH5091> for the multitude <WH1995> of Egypt, <WH4714> and cast them down, <WH3381> even her, <WH1323> and the daughters of the famous <WH117> nations, <WH1471> to the lower parts <WH8482> of the earth, <WH776> with those who go down <WH3381> into the pit. <WH953>
Whom do you pass in beauty? <WH5276> Go down, <WH3381> and be laid <WH7901> with the uncircumcised. <WH6189>

They shall fall <WH5307> in the midst <WH8432> of those who are slain <WH2491> by the sword: <WH2719> she is delivered <WH5414> to the sword; <WH2719> draw <WH4900> her away and all her multitudes. <WH1995>

The strong <WH410> among the mighty <WH1368> shall speak <WH1696> to him out of the midst <WH8432> of Sheol <WH7585> with those who help <WH5826> him: <WH3381> they are gone down, they lie <WH7901> still, <WH6189> even the uncircumcised, slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719>
Asshur <WH804> is there and all her company; <WH6951> her graves <WH6913> are all around <WH5439> her; <WH2491> all of them slain, fallen <WH5307> by the sword; <WH2719>

whose graves <WH6913> are set <WH5414> in the uttermost <WH3411> parts of the pit, <WH953> and her company <WH6951> is around <WH5439> her grave; <WH6900> all of them slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> who caused <WH5414> terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

There is Elam <WH5867> and all her multitude <WH1995> around <WH5439> her grave; <WH6900> all of them slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> who are gone down <WH3381> uncircumcised <WH6189> into the lower parts <WH8482> of the earth, <WH776> who caused <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> and have borne <WH5375> their shame <WH3639> with those who go down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

They have set <WH5414> her a bed <WH4904> in the midst <WH8432> of the slain <WH2491> with all her multitude; <WH1995> her graves <WH6913> are around <WH5439> her; <WH6189> all of them uncircumcised, slain <WH2491> by the sword; <WH2719> for their terror <WH2851> was caused <WH5414> in the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> and they have borne <WH5375> their shame <WH3639> with those who go down <WH3381> to the pit: <WH953> he is put <WH5414> in the midst <WH8432> of those who are slain. <WH2491>

There is Meshech, <WH4902> Tubal, <WH8422> and all their multitude; <WH1995> their graves <WH6913> are around <WH5439> them; <WH6189> all of them uncircumcised, slain <WH2490> by the sword; <WH2719> for they caused <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

They shall not lie <WH7901> with the mighty <WH1368> who are fallen <WH5307> of the uncircumcised, <WH6189> who are gone down <WH3381> to Sheol <WH7585> with their weapons <WH3627> of war, <WH4421> and have laid <WH5414> their swords <WH2719> under their heads, <WH7218> and their iniquities <WH5771> are on their bones; <WH6106> for they were the terror <WH2851> of the mighty <WH1368> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
But you shall be broken <WH7665> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised, <WH6189> and shall lie <WH7901> with those who are slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719>

There is Edom, <WH123> her kings <WH4428> and all her princes, <WH5387> who in their might <WH1369> are laid <WH5414> with those who are slain <WH2491> by the sword: <WH2719> they shall lie <WH7901> with the uncircumcised, <WH6189> and with those who go down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

There are the princes <WH5257> of the north, <WH6828> all of them, <WH6722> and all the Sidonians, who are gone down <WH3381> with the slain; <WH2491> in the terror <WH2851> which they caused by their might <WH1369> they are put to shame; <WH954> and they lie <WH7901> uncircumcised <WH6189> with those who are slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> and bear <WH5375> their shame <WH3639> with those who go down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

Pharaoh <WH6547> shall see <WH7200> them, <WH5162> and shall be comforted over all his multitude, <WH1995> even Pharaoh <WH6547> and all his army, <WH2428> slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

For I have put <WH5414> his terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living; <WH2416> and he shall be laid <WH7901> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised, <WH6189> with those who are slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> even Pharaoh <WH6547> and all his multitude, <WH1995> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
